mabs-i18n-welcome: Used to greet the user when reading the i18n/??.json file.
mabs-setup: Page title of the MABS setup special page.
mabs-setup-intro: Text displayed on the MABS setup SpecialPage.
mabs: Text of the link to the MABS setupspecial page on SpecialPages.
grant-mabs: Describe what the mabs right gives bots the ability to do.
mabs-no-wizard: Title of error page for wizard
mabs-dev-needed: Message telling the user that the developer has to write some code.
mabs-no-wizard-step-list: Title of error page for an un-provided step list
mabs-dev-needed-step-list: Message telling the user that the developer has to provde a list of steps.
mabs-no-wizard-step: Title of error page for a missing wizard step
mabs-dev-needed-step: Message telling the user that the developer has to provide an implementation for a step.
repoform-mabs-config-setup-dependency-se: Header of form for missing composer dependencies
mabs-dependency-gitlib: Message to display if composer dependencies are missing
repoform-mabs-config-setup-prepare-secti: Header of form to prepare repository
mabs-config-please-fix-exists: Message to display if the repository does not exist.
mabs-config-please-fix-directory: Message to display if the repository path is not a directory.
mabs-config-please-fix-writable: Message to display if the repository path is not writable.
repoform-mabs-config-setup-initialize-se: Header of form just before initialization.
mabs-config-create: Message to display on the button that the user will click to perform some action
mabs-config-try-again: Message to display on the button to indicate that the user needs to do something before trying again.
mabs-config-fix-problems: Help message clarifying that the user has to fix some things in the system first.
mabs-config-gitdir-not-writable: Message to display if the dot-git directory in the repository is not writable
mabs-config-not-exists: Message to display if the config file does not exist.  Tell the user we're reaedy to initialize
mabs-config-not-writable: Message to display if the config file is not writable.
repoform-mabs-config-setup-complete-sect: Header of form when initialization is complete
mabs-config-complete: Informative message that the next step will be importing the wiki
mabs-config-continue: Label on the button to continue to import
repoform-mabs-config-import-verify-secti: Header of informative message with error
repoform-mabs-config-import-setremote-se: Header of for to set remote
mabs-config-origin-branch: Label for the name of the remote
mabs-config-cannot-reach-self: Error message shown when networking rules block local wiki
mabs-config-set-remote: Label of button to set remote
